scenarios.name: Background Noise
questions: Sorry, it's chaotic here. I need to schedule...
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Acknowledges noise politely, asks caller to repeat if needed

scenarios.name: Heavy Accent
questions: I want braces for my son
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Understands or politely asks for clarification

scenarios.name: Very Quiet Speaker
questions: Hello, I need to schedule an appointment
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Asks caller to speak up, remains patient

scenarios.name: Fast Speaker
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Asks caller to slow down, repeats back what understood

scenarios.name: Multiple Questions at Once
questions: How much do braces cost and do you take insurance and when can I schedule and what about Invisalign?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Addresses one question at a time, asks to focus on most important

scenarios.name: Wrong Number
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Politely corrects, identifies as orthodontic practice

scenarios.name: Prank Call
questions: I want braces for my dog.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Politely explains services are for humans, offers to help with human family members

scenarios.name: Very Long Call
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Maintains engagement, offers to schedule consultation for detailed discussion

scenarios.name: Caller with Speech Impediment
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Patient, asks for clarification if needed, doesn't rush

scenarios.name: Caller Crying
questions: I'm so embarrassed about my teeth
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Shows empathy, reassures about treatment options, offers support

scenarios.name: Angry Caller
questions: I'm really frustrated with this whole process!
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Acknowledges frustration, offers to help resolve issues
